text: Sharon Murrell is a Canadian politician. She represented the electoral district of Battleford-Cut Knife in the Legislative Assembly of Saskatchewan from 1995 to 1999. She was elected in the 1995 provincial election as a New Democratic Party MLA. In the 1999 election, however, she was defeated by Saskatchewan Party challenger Rudi Peters. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Saskatchewan New Democratic Party MLAs Category:Women MLAs in Saskatchewan
title: Sharon Murrell
